files.description: YAML claim card template defining mandatory fields (verbatim claim, source/context, provenance anchor), validation constraints, and status lifecycle metadata for standardized claim capture.
Markdown workflow specification describing required inputs, step-by-step verification procedure, validation rules, and the claim status lifecycle used by the QA gate.
Machine-readable YAML schema (JSON Schema compatible) for validating CLAIM_CARD artifacts including required fields, formats, enums, and status transition rules.
Central QA gate configuration that adds a claim-card verification gate and wires schema/workflow requirements into the existing QA pipeline.
Validator module that loads CLAIM_CARD YAML/MD frontmatter, enforces schema rules (required inputs, formats, provenance anchor), and checks status lifecycle transitions for QA gating.
QA gate runner that reads qa_gates.yaml, executes the claim-card validator as a required gate, and emits pass/fail with actionable issue reporting for the overall QA report.

missionDescription: Add /outputs/templates/CLAIM_CARD.md (or .yaml) plus /outputs/workflows/CLAIM_VERIFICATION_WORKFLOW.md specifying required inputs (verbatim claim, source/context, provenance anchor), validation rules, and status lifecycle; wire these requirements into the QA gate.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
